explains: adj. 有益于健康的，促进健康的；健全的

sentences.en: Does the college cafeteria provide a healthful diet?
sentences.cn: 此大学餐厅是否供应有益健康的膳食？

sentences.en: In January of last year the Moviemania chain of movie theaters started propping its popcorn in canola oil, instead of the less healthful coconut oil that it had been using until then.
sentences.cn: 去年1月，Moviemania 连锁影院开始用菜籽油代替之前一直使用的不太健康的椰子油来制作爆米花。
健康的饮食增加你的能量。
